img_summary: The image shows a ceramic vessel shaped like a horse's head, likely used as a decorative or collectible item in the game. The vessel has a narrow neck and an open top, suggesting it may be used for pouring or holding liquids. The detailed craftsmanship of the horse's head indicates it could be an artifact or an item of cultural significance within the game's environment. There are no visible UI components, characters, or text hints in the image, focusing solely on the item itself.
